name: integrated corporate management solutions pvt ltd
description: The emergence of strategic project management, a strong discipline practiced by highly trained, certified professionals helping organizations to keep the critical competitive edge and maintain strategic direction in business. Organizations have started realizing that staying in business need effective management beyond tactical level of their projects and 21st century management concept, the project management recognized globally, has the solutions. Smart organizations are using Project Management as a critical Strategic Tool. Integrated Corporate Management Solutions Pvt., Ltd.,[ICMS] is practicing Strategic Project Management for adding value in organizational performance and moving to strategic direction. It derive strengths from network of professionals in global and local markets. ICMS helps organizations building mindset and transform for thriving in the environment of Covid-19 and perpetual disruption.

enhanced_description: Integrated Corporate Management Solutions Pvt. Ltd. (ICMS) specializes in Strategic Project Management, providing a disciplined approach to help organizations achieve a critical competitive edge and maintain strategic direction. The company focuses on adding value to organizational performance and fostering strategic advancement by building competence with a human focus. ICMS offers solutions within the Learning and Development category, including Corporate LMS and Course Authoring, aimed at accelerating skill development, improving learning efficiency, and enhancing employee happiness and engagement. Leveraging a network of global and local professionals, ICMS assists organizations in transforming their mindset to thrive amidst perpetual disruption, exemplified by the challenges of Covid-19. Their core strength is built on integrity, quality, and loyalty, ensuring trusted client relationships through ethical standards, hard work, and inclusive solution development that respects diverse opinions and experiences.
key_use_cases: Maintaining a critical competitive edge through strategic project management
Ensuring strategic direction in business operations
Accelerating skill development within the workforce
Improving learning efficiency across the organization
Building organizational competence for strategic advancement
Transforming organizational mindset to adapt to disruption (e.g., post-Covid-19 environment)
competitive_advantages: Expertise in Strategic Project Management via highly trained, certified professionals
Leverages a global and local network of professionals for strength
Focus on adding strategic value and moving organizations towards strategic direction, beyond tactical project management
Commitment to high ethical standards, honesty, and hard work in client relationships (Integrity, Quality)
Client-centric approach with loyalty to purpose and building trusted relationships
Inclusive approach to problem-solving, respecting diverse opinions and experiences
Emphasis on human factors and building organizational mindset
